reviewText: No sound on the tape....tried two VHS players an still no sound.  Should have returned it.

If you've ever taken your little one out in public you've noticed that they are most fascinated when another baby comes into  view, even if you want them to be looking at the elephant!  This video  gets that and provides those charming images in each of seven play scenes.  If you worry about showing video to a child under age three, don't worry with this video.  It is wholesome and presents healthy play in a supervised environment.  If only life with baby were this fun and easy every day! The two other videos in this series are equally charming.
